author: Jeff Wright
title: Draffin & Tucker Named 2015 Best of the Best Accounting Firm by INSIDE Public Accounting
text:
Draffin & Tucker, LLP is pleased to announce the firm was recently named to INSIDE Public Accounting’s Best of the Best Accounting Firms for 2015. IPA’s annual Best of the Best recognition honors 60 CPA firms, large or small, across the country for their overall superior financial and operational performance on more than 70 criteria. The right combination of planning, strategy and execution distinguish Best of the Best firms from more than 500 firms that participated in IPA’s 25th Annual Survey and Analysis of Firms. Exceptional client service, commitment to firm-wide training and prized staff benefits are features of the IPA Best of the Best.
“Best of the Best firms aren’t just successful in a financial sense – they’re firing on all cylinders,” says Michael Platt, principal of the Platt Group and publisher of the accounting trade publication, INSIDE Public Accounting. “We look at the whole firm: How do they treat their employees? Are they offering specialized services to their clients? Are they planning now for a new leadership team in the future?”
“On behalf of our entire firm, we are honored to be named in IPA's 2015 Best of the Best accounting firms,” says Draffin & Tucker’s managing partner, Jeff Wright. “Outstanding clients and a dedicated team committed to excellence provides us with the foundation to be recognized in such an elite group. Our continued success depends upon maintaining the exceptional relationship we have between our clients and team members.”
A full list of the 2015 IPA Best of the Best firms can be found at: http://insidepublicaccounting.com/newsletters/ipa-best-of-the-best/
ABOUT DRAFFIN & TUCKER, LLP
Draffin & Tucker, LLP is a regional full-service accounting firm widely recognized as a leader in the healthcare industry, with an additional focus on the construction, manufacturing, real estate and governmental industries. Celebrating more than 65 years of quality client service, the firm provides auditing, income tax and consulting services to clients across multiple states, primarily the Southeast. Draffin & Tucker, LLP is a 75 member team dedicated to meeting client needs, with office locations in Albany, Ga., and Atlanta, Ga. More information is available at http://www.draffin-tucker.com .
ABOUT INSIDE PUBLIC ACCOUNTING
INSIDE Public Accounting (IPA), founded in 1987, is published by The Platt Group. The Platt Group publishes both the award-winning INSIDE Public Accounting newsletter and the award-winning National Benchmarking Report. The Platt Group also consults with firms to help them become more successful. The Platt Group works with managing partners, CFOs and thought leaders across the nation to provide practical ideas, benchmarking data and information to take firms to the next level of improvement.
